wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Cecil Burton (14 December 1909 – 4 April 1986) was an English first-class cricketer active 1930 who played for Middlesex. He was born in Stamford Hill; died in Eastbourne.

response: Their debut full-length album, Acquired Taste, was released in 2004, on the Keremos label and EMI Belgium. It was produced by Geoffrey Burton.
